info.description: Get messages from a specific Egg or topic over a period of time, optionally filtered by location. https://airqualityegg.wickeddevice.com/api. Authentication using JWT tokens, include header Authorization Bearer your-jwt-token-here
info.title: Air Quality Egg Messages API

post.summary: logs in to get JWT token
post.description: logs in as a user and gets back a JWT on success

200.description: An object with a jwt field containing the JSON Web Token for subsequent use in Authorization HTTP header.  A failure to login will generally be accompanied by an error field explaining why.

get.summary: gets an Egg's most recently reported data
get.description: Gets an object representing the most recent message sent to each topic by a specific Egg. The specific keys of the returned object will depend on the type of Egg and what it reports. These keys are taken directly from MQTT topic string using the part after 'aqe/' and before '/serial-number'. The objects attached to each of these keys are the most recent payload reported by the Egg on that topic, augmented with a 'date' field which is a ISO-8601 formatted timestmap associated with that particular message.  Also optionally accepts a comma separated list of serial numbers, in which case the result is an array of objects instead of a singular object.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.description: Egg serial number, typically starts with egg0080

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: should be a string of the form "Bearer your-jwt-here"

200.description: Most recent record messages on each topic from target Egg

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get back messages published by a specific Egg over a period of time (required start-date + end-date, or start-date + dur, or end-date + dur). Also optionally accepts a comma separated list of serial numbers.

parameters.name: serial_number
parameters.description: Egg serial number, typically starts with egg0080

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: should be a string of the form "Bearer your-jwt-here"

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 date string marking the beginning of the requested time period.

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 date string marking the end of the requested time period

parameters.name: dur
parameters.description: ISO-8601 duration string to be used in conjunction with _either_ start-date or end-date, not both

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Decimal value of latitude for proximity filter (in degrees)

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Decimal value of longitude for proximity filter (in degrees)

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Decimal value of radius for proximity filter (in meters)

200.description: messages from target Egg matching temporal and spatial filter criteria

get.description: By passing in the appropriate options, you can get back messages published to a specific topic over a period of time (required start-date + end-date, or start-date + dur, or end-date + dur). Replace the trailing serial-number in a topic to get back messages from _any_ Egg on that topic prefix (e.g. /orgs/wd/aqe/temperature/#) matching the temporal and spatial filters.

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: an mqtt topic string, typically starts with /orgs/wd/aqe/

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: should be a string of the form "Bearer your-jwt-here"

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 date string marking the beginning of the requested time period.

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: ISO-8601 date string marking the end of the requested time period

parameters.name: dur
parameters.description: ISO-8601 duration string to be used in conjunction with _either_ start-date or end-date, not both

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Decimal value of latitude for proximity filter (in degrees)

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Decimal value of longitude for proximity filter (in degrees)

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Decimal value of radius for proximity filter (in meters)

200.description: messages from target topic matching temporal and spatial filter criteria
